sys_script.name: Validate week start

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_537510_verizon_t_verizon_time_card</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate week start</name><order>400</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

var weekStarts = current.getValue('u_week_starts_on');
		
	var gd1 = new GlideDate(); 
		gd1.setValue(weekStarts); 
	var expectedStartDay = gd1.getDayOfWeekUTC();
	
	if(expectedStartDay != 1){
			
		gs.setError('This is not a Monday');
		//gs.addErrorMessage('This is not a Monday')
			current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-25 22:52:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>68e5e82cdb2310100080e1bb4b961920</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate week start</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Verizon Time Card App" source="x_537510_verizon_t">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Verizon Time Card App">bdc95024db2310100080e1bb4b9619d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_68e5e82cdb2310100080e1bb4b961920</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-09-28 21:38:16</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=68e5e82cdb2310100080e1bb4b961920"/></record_update>
